extendedInfo.description: Transform any picture using this edge detection tool. Take a photo or select your image from the gallery to convert into a whole new picture with the edges detected. This app produces fantastic artistic results and allows a different perspective on images.The lite version contains Ads.You cannot move app to SD card in the lite version.You cannot save any of the transformed images in the lite version.To enable these features please purchase and download the full version of Edge Detector
